title: Are the degrees of the CMJ University valid or not? - Quora

response.answer_text: The question itself is tricky as the CMJ university was established with state act and as any approved university UGC permitted it to award degrees to the students but there was some irregularities were found in awarding PhD degrees so the case about this is still in high court and the court has put an stay on degrees award during 2009 period so it's better for you to go for any other university as the outcome of the case is sitll awaited.
